name: Make Spenny Hurl
description:
You can now make Spencer Rice hurl, just get the ipecac to Spencer's mouth before he wakes up!

This game is based on an episode of Kenny vs Spenny ("Who Can Drink the Most Beer"). It was made in four days with Godot Engine as part of the Weekly Game Jam - Week 164 (Theme: Hurl).

Controls:

Spacebar to move the Ipecac
or tap the screen if you're on mobile
